"After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more. One thing you'll kill for. Blood." - Rosalie to Bella Swan, Eclipse

"You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it. So I'm not giving up." 
- Jacob Black to Bella Swan, Eclipse

- Eclipse

- Edward Cullen, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

"Let's face it. I'm hotter than you." 
- Jacob Black, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

- Edward Cullen, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

- Jacob Black, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

- The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

story: Eclipse updated their cover photo.

message: "Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever." - Edward Cullen, The Twilight Saga Eclipse
"Everybody makes choices. You're gonna have to accept mine." - Bella Swan to Jacob Black, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
"I got my revenge on them. Saved Royce for last, so he'd know I was coming." - Rosalie Hale to Bella Swan, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
"Some of you are gonna get hurt. Some of you could get killed because of me." - Bella Swan, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
"Mom, I miss you." - Bella Swan, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
"I don't hate you. I don't particularly like you, but... Bella, I envy you." - Rosalie Hale to Bella Swan, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

Bella Swan: "You know 2 out of 3 marriages end in divorce."
Edward Cullen: "I think you'll find the, uh, Vampire human divorce rate is a little lower. Just marry me." - The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

"You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it. So I'm not giving up." 
- Jacob Black to Bella Swan, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
"I'm tired of this. From now on I'm Switzerland, okay?" - Bella Swan, Eclipse

Bella Swan: "Hey, lose the grin, Jacob. We're just going for a ride."
Jacob Black: "Hold on tight!"
- Eclipse

"If I'd met you back then, I would've courted you. I may have stolen a kiss or two, but only after asking your father's permission, I would've got down on knee. And I would've presented you with a ring." - Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"Imprinting on someone is like, when you see her... Everything changes. All of a sudden, it's not gravity holding you to the planet. It's her... Nothing else matters." - Jacob Black, Eclipse
"I know the consequences of the choices you're making. After a few decades, everyone you know will be dead." - Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"I kissed Bella. And she broke her hand. Punching my face. Total misunderstanding." - Jacob Black, Eclipse
"You'll always be my Bella." - Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"She's still human. The Volturi don't give second chances." - Jane, Eclipse

Edward Cullen: "You love him."
Bella Swan: "I love you more."
- Eclipse
"I'm gonna fight for you until your heart stops beating.” - Jacob Black, Eclipse

"Let's face it, I am hotter than you."
- Jacob Black to Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"I'm not just going to hide while you take all the risks for me." - Bella Swan, Eclipse
"You wouldn't have to change for me, Bella. Or say goodbye to anybody. I can give you more than him." - Jacob Black, Eclipse

"Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever."
- Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"Doesn't he own a shirt?" - Edward Cullen, Eclipse

Edward Cullen: "Can you at least attempt to control your thoughts."
Jacob Black: "I really get under that ice cold skin of yours, don't I?"
- Eclipse
"I'm exactly right for you, Bella. It would be as easy as breathing with me." - Jacob Black, Eclipse

Charlie Swan: Theres... things that you need to think about if your going to be... physically intimate...
Bella Swan: Okay, don't have 'the talk', please.
- Eclipse

Edward Cullen: That could be extremely dangerous.
Bella Swan: Good thing you're bulletproof.
- Eclipse
"You believe I have a soul, and I don't. But to risk yours just for the sake of never having to lose you, that's the most selfish thing I'll ever do." - Edward Cullen, Eclipse
"I've chosen my life. I want to start living it." - Bella Swan in Eclipse

"Edward Cullen: Marry me.
Bella Swan: Change me."
-Eclipse
"I understand how that's what you want. But there's nothing I'm ever going to want more than Edward." - Bella Swan in Eclipse

"You need to know that I'm in love with you, and I want you to choose me instead of him." 
- Jacob Black in Eclipse
"Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever." - Edward Cullen in Eclipse
